Texts.Chs: 开赴骑士们对于保卫我们的族群来说至关重要。 用我给你的^orange;开赴骑士之矛^green;狩猎一只成年吐舌娃，并给我它的^orange;怪物巨骨^white;带给我。这样做，你就能证明你有开赴骑士的力量。
Texts.Eng: Keffriders are vital to the defence of our clans. Use the ^orange;Keffrider's Spear ^white;I gave you to ^green;hunt down an Adult Poptop and bring me its ^orange;Grand Monster Bone^white;. Do this, and you'll prove you have the strength of a Keffrider.

Texts.Chs: 干得好，上尉！你已经证明了你的荣耀和力量，但是还有一个任务需要你去完成。
Texts.Eng: Well done, Captain! You have proven your merit and your strength, but there is one more task for you to complete.
